Summary line

root: DataNode

Does stuff

level_keys_full_name: ddict(list)

add_data(data)¶
datapd.DataFrame

Data which will be used to fill the nodes with a Series.

classmethod from_analysis_design(analysis_design, data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, should_aggregate_technical_replicates: bool = True)¶

analysis_design data

Will be passed to add_data

should_aggregate_technical_replicates

cls

mspypeline.helpers.plot_annotate_line(ax, row1, row2, x, data, fs=None, maxasterix=None)¶

adjusted function from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11517986/indicating-the-statistically-significant-difference-in-bar-graph Annotate plot with p-values with line indicators.

Parameters

  • ax – axis of plot to put the annotaion line

  • num1 – number of left bar to put bracket over

  • num2 – number of right bar to put bracket over

  • data – string to write or number for generating asterixes

  • fs – font size

  • maxasterix – maximum number of asterixes to write (for very small p-values)

mspypeline.helpers.get_logger(name: str = None, loglevel: Union[int, str] = 10) → logging.Logger¶
name

name of the logger, if none the filename will be used instead

loglevel

loglevel of the logger, either an int or the str level names of the logging module

logging.Logger

A logger with respective level and formatted output
